adapter.args-description: Arguments accepted by your script function, in comma-separated 'name: value' format, with string values in quotes.

adapter.postCommand-description: Command to run after the script completes.

export.label-share-description: Share this link with another Note Toolbar user to add your toolbar to their vault.
export.button-copy-link-description: Copy this link to your clipboard
export.notice-completed: Toolbar copied to clipboard as callout. Open settings to adjust formatting.
export.notice-shared: Note Toolbar link copied to clipboard
export.warning-share-menu: This toolbar refers to at least one other toolbar that the recipient won't receive.
export.warning-share-length: Some web browsers may not load a URL that is longer than 2,048 characters.
export.option-uri-description: Provides an obsidian:// link instead of an https:// URL.

import.label-import-confirmation: Confirm you would like to add this toolbar. Once added, this toolbar will need to be mapped to one or more notes.
import.label-import: Paste a Note Toolbar Callout below and it will be added as a new toolbar.
import.label-import-into: Paste a Note Toolbar Callout below and its items will be added to this toolbar. Styles will be ignored if provided.
import.label-import-into-help: The callout heading is not needed, and will be ignored if provided.
import.error-invalid-uri-content: Note Toolbar: It looks like there's an issue with this link. Check the URI is correct, or review the user guide.
import.warning-invalid-plugins: This toolbar uses plugins you do not have installed and enabled:
import.warning-vars: This toolbar uses variables, which you can modify to work with your vault.

notice.error-command-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this command. Command not found: {{command}}
notice.error-folder-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this folder. Folder not found: {{folder}}
notice.error-item-menu-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this menu item. Toolbar not found: {{toolbar}}
notice.error-scripting-not-enabled: Enable Scripting in Note Toolbar settings to use this item.
notice.error-scripting-plugin-not-enabled: Toggle the Scripting setting after installing and enabling plugin: {{plugin}}
notice.error-toolbar-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this toolbar. Toolbar not found: {{toolbar}}
notice.error-uri-params-not-supported: One or more of these Note Toolbar URI parameters is not supported: {{params}}
notice.warning-no-matching-toolbar:
Note Toolbar: No matching toolbar: {{toolbar}}
Click/Tap here to create it.

setting.error-old-settings-name: ⚠️ Error: Please disable and renable Note Toolbar, or restart Obsidian.
setting.error-old-settings-description: Old settings file loaded ({{oldVersion}}) but latest is {{currentVersion}}

copy-as-callout.title: Copy as callout
copy-as-callout.description: Define what happens when toolbars are converted to callouts.
copy-as-callout.option-icons-description: Add icon placeholders to callouts. (Example: :LiHome:) The Iconize plugin must be installed and enabled to see icons. If disabled, tooltips will be used if labels are not set. Icons can be imported by other users.
copy-as-callout.option-vars-description: Any variables and expressions used in the toolbar will be replaced with values from the note you're currently viewing. Example: {{note_title}} → My Note
copy-as-callout.option-ids-description: This ensures menu items still work for you if the menu toolbar's renamed. If you want to share callouts, turn this off, and the toolbar's name will be used instead.
copy-as-callout.option-data-description: Data elements allow toolbars opened in new windows to still work. If disabled, Note Toolbar URIs will be used instead of data elements, and also provide cleaner-looking markdown.

delete-toolbar.name: Delete this toolbar
delete-toolbar.title: Delete toolbar: {{toolbar}}
delete-toolbar.label-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this toolbar?

display-contexts.name: Show toolbars in other views
display-contexts.description: Enable toolbars in canvases and the New tab view.
display-contexts.option-canvas-description: Show mapped toolbars in canvas files.
display-contexts.option-filemenu-description: Adds an item to the File menu to access the toolbar in the linked note.
display-contexts.option-emptyview-description: Select a toolbar to show when no note is open.

display-rules.name: Display rules
display-rules.description: Define which notes to display toolbars on, using a property, mappings, or both.
display-rules.option-property-description: If a toolbar name is found in this property, the toolbar will be displayed on the note. This takes precedence over any folder mappings. In a note, set this property to 'none' to hide the toolbar.

help.title: Help using Note Toolbar 🛟
help.description: Create context-aware toolbars for your notes.
help.label-article-1-description: Learn about the different types of items.
help.label-article-2-description: Learn how to create toolbars within your notes.
help.label-bug-description: Found a problem? Please log an issue in GitHub, or complete this Google form.
help.label-donate-description: If you find this plugin useful, and wish to support me financially, consider donating. Thank you!
help.label-examples-description: Get inspired by these ready-to-go toolbar examples.
help.label-feedback-description: Use this Google form for any feedback, questions, or ideas you may have.
help.label-support-description: Visit the forums on GitHub to ask questions to the community.
help.label-user-guide-description: How to make the most out of the plugin, including tips and examples.

item.title: Edit toolbar item
item.menu-copy-id-notice: Toolbar item ID copied to clipboard.
item.label-preview-empty-no-items: No items. Edit this toolbar to add items.
item.option-command-error-not-available-insta: This command is not available. Plugin must be installed and enabled.
item.option-command-error-not-available-searc: This command cannot be found. Try searching again.
item.option-file-error-does-not-exist: This file or folder does not exist.
item.option-item-group-help: Select a toolbar to insert into this one.
item.option-item-menu-help: Select a toolbar to open as a menu.
item.option-uri-help: Tip: Use note properties and expressions in URIs.

items.name: Items
items.description: Add items to the toolbar, in order.
items.button-add-break-tooltip: Add a line break to the toolbar
items.button-add-separator-tooltip: Add a separator to the toolbar
items.button-new-item-tooltip: Add a new item to the toolbar

mappings.name: Folder mappings
mappings.description: Notes in folders below will display the toolbar mapped to it. Precedence is top to bottom.
mappings.label-empty: Use the button to create a mapping.
mappings.error-folder-already-mapped: This folder already has a toolbar associated with it.

name.name: Name
name.description: Give this toolbar a unique name.
name.error-toolbar-already-exists: A toolbar already exists with this name.

open-command.name: Add toolbar command
open-command.description: Add a command that opens this toolbar in a Quick Tools window.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Sets the icon for the floating button and navigation bar (on phone). Requires restart.

ribbon-action.name: Ribbon icon action 📱
ribbon-action.description: Action to take when the ribbon icon (on phones) is used.

scripting.name: Scripting
scripting.description: Adds item types for Dataview, JS Engine, and Templater, which must be installed and enabled.

show-edit-tbar.name: Show "Edit toolbar" link in toolbar menus
show-edit-tbar.description: Adds an item to access the toolbar's settings in toolbars that are displayed as menus.

position.name: Position
position.option-mobile-help: Tip: Access toolbars from the navigation bar.
position.option-defaultitem-description: Instead of the toolbar menu, show this item as the button. Other items appear in right-click menu (long-press on mobile).
position.notice-defaultitem-invalid: Invalid default item for floating button. Check toolbar configuration.

styles.name: Styles
styles.title: Style toolbar: {{toolbar}}
styles.description: List of styles to apply to the toolbar.
styles.help: Customize even more with the Style Settings plugin.
styles.option-autohide-disclaimer: Auto-hide does not apply on mobile.
styles.option-nowrap-disclaimer: Works best if items are not evenly spaced or centered.
styles.option-sticky-disclaimer: Sticky does not apply in Reading mode.
styles.option-custom-description: List of classes defined in CSS snippets to apply to this toolbar, separated by spaces.
styles.option-default-description: Applies to all platforms unless overridden.
styles.option-mobile-empty: No mobile styles set. Using default styles.

toolbars.name: Toolbars
toolbars.label-empty-create-tbar: Use the button to create a toolbar.

usage.name: Usage
usage.description: This toolbar is used in {{mappingCount}} mapping(s) and {{itemCount}} toolbar item(s).

whats-new.title: What's new in Note Toolbar?
whats-new.label-release-notes-description: Detailed notes for the latest releases are on GitHub.
whats-new.label-roadmap-description: Check out the Roadmap to preview the features under consideration.
